hero.title: Our Story
hero.subtitle: Where generations of craftsmanship meet modern café culture

legacy.title: A Legacy of Excellence
legacy.description1: Café Costermans emerges from a rich family heritage rooted in Costermans Antiquaire, where for generations, our family has cultivated an appreciation for craftsmanship, authenticity, and the finest things in life.
legacy.description2: This deep understanding of quality and attention to detail naturally evolved into our café, where we apply the same principles to every cup of coffee, every dish, and every moment our guests spend with us.
legacy.description3: Located in the heart of Place du Grand Sablon, our café pays homage to this historic square while bringing fresh energy to one of Brussels' most beloved neighborhoods.

terrace.title: Our Secret Terrace
terrace.subtitle: Tucked away in the heart of Sablon, our terrace offers a timeless escape from the bustling city
terrace.description: Natural materials, warm lighting, and subtle antique details create an atmosphere that feels both contemporary and timeless. Every element has been chosen to reflect our family's appreciation for enduring beauty and authentic craftsmanship.

philosophy.title: Our Culinary Philosophy
philosophy.description1: Every dish tells a story of careful sourcing and artisan preparation. We work closely with local Belgian producers who share our commitment to quality and sustainability.
philosophy.description2: From our signature coffee blends to our seasonal brunch offerings, each element is crafted with the same attention to detail that has defined the Costermans family for generations.
philosophy.description3: Our menu evolves with the seasons, ensuring freshness while maintaining the timeless classics that have become favorites among our guests.
